content: each st around continue to work around in a spiral until you reach 24 rounds or until you are within ¼ of your desired length **make sure you end your last round on one of the small sides ** 21 single_crochet in next 7 sts chain 6 single_crochet in next 15 sts chain 38 single_crochet in next 15 sts you should now be at the chain 6 space place 6 single_crochet s around the chain single_crochet in next 15 sts you should now be at the chain 38 space single_crochet in each back bump of the chain single_crochet in next 7 sts slip_stitch around the entire piece join to 1st slip_stitch fo weave in ends and you re done loopy phone wristlet pattern by misty makes 2
